item.title: By: Martin G

item.description:
Oh, and I like this increased posting ratio once more - are we egging one another on?

item.title: By: Martin G
item.dc:creator: Martin G
item.description:
I like this - it makes rather more sense than the basic 'we outspent the Soviets and made them crumble - go Ronnie!' explanation.
Interesting parallel to interwar Germany, too - though I think there might a have been a few more factors at work there...
item.content:encoded:
I like this – it makes rather more sense than the basic ‘we outspent the Soviets and made them crumble – go Ronnie!’ explanation.

Interesting parallel to interwar Germany, too – though I think there might a have been a few more factors at work there…
